thread.section_title: Smooth Hotel Rome Termini - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: fantastic Value
thread.title_full: fantastic Value - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: irishtourerDingle
title: fantastic Value
text: Had a wonderful stay here, The hotel and rooms are spotless, The staff very friendly and helpful, The breakfast had a great selection of both hot and cold food. 10 minute walk to the nearest metro and a few minutes more to the termini, Very close to the British Embassy, Overall Great value for money and a great base for touring the wonderful sights of Rome.
